title: What are the recommended respiratory exercises and treatments for various illnesses?
first_phrase: In this health text, the author discusses various diseases and their treatments. The previous section covered the importance of fresh air and water intake while treating fever. The following passage advises patients suffering from liver diseases, gastritis, and gout, among other issues, to practice deep breathing exercises frequently. The text also recommends a vegetarian diet and outdoor exercises to avoid gout. Additionally, it stresses the importance of a medical examination for those suffering from edema, as it may indicate a severe underlying medical condition. The author acknowledges that bad dreams often result from poor digestion but may also signify a lack of oxygen in the blood.
